|brand = DrayTek |model = Vigor 2925 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = ac |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = VGYV2860AC |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Lantiq (Intel);PSB 80920;XWAY VRX288, 7G31801I00, H1335, PSB 80920 EL V1.2; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 34Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 600 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Toshiba;TC58NVG0S3ETA00; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM68C16CWQD-25H; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C; |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = 2 |wan_ports = 2 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 5 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:1D:AA |oui = 00:1D:AA,54:2A:A2
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/12/2015 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = 4716779078855 |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B015GC37H4 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Alpha Networks WMC-AC05HP |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (oversize) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880;QCA9880-BR4A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1300 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9582; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :[https://www.draytek.com/en/download/firmware/vigor2925-series/ User's guide] :[http://eu.draytek.com:50000/Logon.php Smart Monitor Demo] {{•}} [http://eu.draytek.com:12925 Demo UI] "8WMCAC05.2A1G" and "1412" is silkscreened on the card in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2610403 FCC photos]. {{see also|DrayTek Vigor 2760Vn|Alpha Networks}} Default settings are per the FCC manual.
===Specifications=== *Dual Gigabit Ethernet WAN port for failover and load-balancing *2x USB 2.0 ports for 3G/LTE mobile, FTP server and network printers *5x Gigabit LAN ports with multiple subnets *Working with VigorACS SI Central Management for multi-site deploymen *Integrated with 802.11ac wireless access point (Vigor 2925ac/2925Vac) *VoIP for cost-effective communication (Vigor 2925Vac/2925Vn-plus)
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.pcworld.idg.com.au/review/draytek/vigor-2925ac/582049/ Reviewed on '''PCWorld'''] *[https://geektimes.ru/company/digitalangel/blog/280228/ Reviewed on '''GeekTimes'''] (RU) *[https://www.mbreviews.com/draytek-vigor2926-review/ ''DrayTek Vigor 2926'' Reviewed on '''MBReviews'''] :Lantiq CPU @720MHz for all variants (2926/2926ac/2926Vac) :128MB Toshiba TC58NVG0S3ETA00 LF0525 - CMOS NAND Flash Memory :128MB Winbond W971GG6SB-25 G8173H400532 - SDRAM DDR2 :Qualcomm Atheros AR8035-A NJ806004 1806 CN - Ethernet PHY Chip :LVC08A 8980032 YXD18 - Logic Gate, 2x PKP DIP2401-AG 1823 IC :2x G2PM109N LF 1825E - 1000 Base-T Dual Port Magnetic Modules
==See also== *[[DrayTek Vigor 3220ac]] - Dual-WAN Security Firewall :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/VGYV2860AC VGYV2860AC] (05/12/2015) [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2610411 Doc] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2925ac]] - Dual-WAN Security Firewall :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/VGYV2860AC VGYV2860AC] (05/12/2015) [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2610411 Doc] :Lantiq PSB 80920, QCA8337-AL3C, QCA9880 (5GHz) *[[DrayTek Vigor 2860ac]] - Dual-WAN Security Firewall :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/VGYV2860AC VGYV2860AC] (05/12/2015) *[[DrayTek Vigor 2860Vn]] - Dual-WAN Security Firewall :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/VGYV2860VN VGYV2860VN] (01/09/2014) • [[DrayTek Vigor 2925n]] :[[Alpha Networks]] WMC-ND07 (5GHz), RT5392L (2.4GHz) *[[DrayTek Vigor 2952n]] - Dual-WAN Security Firewall :• FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/VGY2952 VGY2952] (10/04/2016) :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621AT @880MHz Dual Core :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7602EN 2T2R 802.11bgn *[[DrayTek Vigor 2912n]] - Dual-WAN Security Firewall *[[DrayTek Vigor 2830n]] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2760Vn]] *[[DrayTek Vigor 2710ne]]
